channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title:
经过十年的战争，联合国认为也门的人道主义危机是世界上最严重的危机之一。
也门 3300 万人口中有一半以上需要援助才能生存。但胡塞武装在其西北部的地盘上阻碍了援助物资的流动👇。
item.description:
After a decade of war, the UN reckons that the humanitarian crisis in Yemen is one of the world’s worst.

Over half of its 33m people need aid to survive. But across their realm in the north-west the Houthis hinder aid flows econ.st/49xIdHu 👇

item.title: 美国陆军的未来在欧洲还是亚洲？它不可能同时在欧洲和亚洲发动战争 👇。
item.description: Does the US Army’s future lie in Europe or Asia? It could not wage wars in both at the same time econ.st/48n2QFq 👇

item.title: 经济学人》发表的新证据显示，克里姆林宫的情报机构已经从过去两年的错误中吸取了教训
item.description: New evidence, published by The Economist, shows that the Kremlin’s intelligence agencies have learned from their mistakes over the past two years econ.st/42NtiqB

item.title:
去年，欧洲做出了一个非正统的决定，在冬季来临之前向乌克兰输送 30 亿立方米天然气用于储存。
这一交易既保持了储备，又带来了丰厚的利润。这或许是欧洲大陆未来能源战略的一个缩影 👇。
item.description:
Last year Europe made the unorthodox decision to pump 3bn cubic metres of natural gas to Ukraine for storage ahead of winter.

The trade kept reserves stocked and provided healthy profits. It may be a glimpse at the continent’s future energy strategy econ.st/4bIUdI8 👇

item.title: 生产无排放电力的工艺越来越便宜。但是，为了使电气化成为气候的福音和工业的财富，它需要变得更加多才多艺 👇。
item.description: Processes for producing emissions-free electricity are getting cheaper. But in order for electrification to be a boon for the climate and a bonanza for industry it needs to become more versatile econ.st/3uAxAF8 👇

item.title:
虽然购买通胀保值债券来抵御通胀似乎不无道理，但在最近的通胀肆虐期间，这将是一个非常无利可图的举动。
债券的意义何在？ 👇
item.description:
Although buying inflation-protected bonds to protect against inflation does not seem unreasonable, it would have been a spectacularly unprofitable move during the latest bout of inflation.

What is the point of the bonds? econ.st/49xCzFi 👇

item.title: 中国的半导体供应链正在稳步深化。但它能与竞争对手相媲美吗？ 👇
item.description: China’s semiconductor supply chain is steadily deepening. But can it ever match that of its rivals? econ.st/3HZy8aH 👇

item.title: 过去几年对俄罗斯间谍来说是煎熬的几年。但 @RUSI_org 收集并由《经济学人》发表的证据表明，他们正在从错误中吸取教训，并开始了针对西方的政治战争的新阶段 👇。
item.description: The past few years were torrid for Russian spies. But evidence gathered by @RUSI_org and published by The Economist shows that they are learning from their errors and embarking on a new phase of political warfare against the West econ.st/3wlxDFj 👇

item.title: 去年，Temu 是美国、英国、法国和德国下载量最大的应用程序。Shein已经在美国青少年中引起了购物热潮。但零售商能赢得大批购物者的青睐吗？ 👇
item.description: Last year Temu was the most downloaded app in America, Britain, France and Germany. Shein is already a shopping sensation among American teenagers. But can the retailers win over shoppers en masse? econ.st/3SZiliy 👇

item.title: 一位精神分析师解释了为什么对感到 "疲惫不堪 "的人来说，仅仅尝试放松并不总是有效 👇
item.description: A psychoanalyst explains why for people feeling “burnt out”, simply trying to relax doesn’t always work econ.st/3SJ6W4V 👇

item.title: 在更换欧盟高级官员的过程中，通常会发生很多不体面的争吵。但欧盟可以采取一些措施来减少争吵，避免分裂 ⬇️
item.description: The process of replacing the EU’s top officials usually entails a lot of undignified squabbling. But there are things the bloc can do to reduce the angst and avoid divisions econ.st/3OM5xcL ⬇️

item.title:
民意调查一致显示，在今年晚些时候的南非大选中，非国大的得票率可能会跌破 50%。
好斗的反对党领袖朱利叶斯-马莱马（Julius Malema）可能是政府连任前景的关键👇。
item.description:
Polls consistently suggest that the ANC could dip below 50% of the vote in South Africa’s elections later this year.

Julius Malema, the combative opposition leader, may hold the key to the government’s re-election prospects econ.st/3wogniY 👇

item.title: 德国鲁尔区曾经拥有欧洲最大的煤矿、最大的钢铁厂以及为两次世界大战提供物资的军工厂，如今已被掏空。但它的复兴为德国未来的⬇️。
item.description: Once home to Europe’s biggest coal mine, its biggest steel mill and munitions plants that supplied two world wars, Germany’s Ruhr has been hollowed out. But its rebound offers a model for the country’s future econ.st/3OLtlxi ⬇️

item.title: 长期受到投资者冷落的日本企业最近备受关注。尤其是该国的芯片制造工具制造商👇。
item.description: Corporate Japan, long snubbed by investors, has been the source of much attention lately. That is especially so for the country’s manufacturers of chipmaking tools econ.st/3OMFItf 👇

item.title:
在 TikTok 上，普拉博沃-苏比安托是一位可爱的老爷爷，他喜欢他的猫鲍比，而且跳得不好。
但这位似乎有可能领导世界第三大民主国家的人却在一段令人不安的过去面前手舞足蹈--很少有印尼年轻人知道或关心这段过去。
item.description:
On TikTok Prabowo Subianto is a cute grandpa who loves his cat, Bobby, and dances badly.

But the man who seems likely to lead the world’s third-biggest democracy is dancing around a troubling past—which few young Indonesians either know or care about econ.st/3uAVyjJ 👇

item.title: 海南是中国最南端的一个岛屿，游客可以在这里享受免税购物、热带雨林徒步旅行和电影节。但随着国际旅游的恢复，海南岛可能需要新的方式来吸引中国的富裕游客
item.description: Visitors to Hainan, an island off China’s southernmost tip, can enjoy duty-free shopping, hikes through tropical forests and film festivals. But as international travel resumes, the island may need new ways of attracting China’s wealthy travellers econ.st/3T5gWXS

item.title: 日本的半导体工具制造商正在蓬勃发展。但这种繁荣还能持续多久？ 👇
item.description: Japan’s semiconductor toolmakers are booming. But how long will it last? econ.st/3I4sm7U 👇

item.title: 气候将成为英国下届大选的战场
item.description: Climate will be a battleground in Britain’s next election econ.st/48dpQH3

item.title: 亚马逊对 Shein 和 Temu 有多担心？
item.description: How worried should Amazon be about Shein and Temu? econ.st/3SZnnvb

item.title: 英国警方为何应关注受害者
item.description: Why British police should focus on victims econ.st/3P7X7Nd

item.title: 欧洲尚未尝试就决定不喜欢实验室培育的肉类
item.description: Europe decides it doesn’t like lab-grown meat before it’s tried it econ.st/3SYYK1J

item.title: 非洲国家政府重返国际债券市场
item.description: African governments return to international bond markets econ.st/3uDMOJx

item.title: 美国钢铁公司之争显示了国家安全的新内涵
item.description: The row over US Steel shows the new meaning of national security econ.st/3SEDLzV

item.title:
从理论上讲，英国的补选并不值得关注。参加补选的人很少，而且补选并不总是国家情绪的可靠指南。
它们之所以重要，是因为它们对政治家来说意义重大👇。
item.description:
In theory, British by-elections do not justify the attention they receive. Few people vote in them and are not always reliable guides to the mood of the country.

The reason they matter is the significance they hold to politicians econ.st/48oyv9s 👇

item.title: 2024 年是对民主神经的巨大考验
item.description: 2024 is a giant test of nerves for democracy econ.st/3OJLbRq

item.title: 新技术正在净化工业流程
item.description: New technologies are cleaning up industrial processes econ.st/3SI0smV

item.title: 在美国寻求正义并非朝九晚五的工作
item.description: The search for justice in America is not a nine-to-five job econ.st/3T0AKvp

item.title:
"这些艺术品是如此诱人和令人沮丧 因为里面的东西似乎是如此难以接近"
@amayor 在本周的 "巴贝奇 "播客中讨论了人工智能如何破译古代卷轴👇。
item.description:
“These are artefacts that have been so tempting and frustrating because what’s in them seems so inaccessible.”

@amayor discusses how AI can decipher ancient scrolls, on this week’s “Babbage” podcast econ.st/3weOz06 👇

item.title: "即使这些政党失败了，他们似乎也有不成比例的影响力"。在我们的 "制衡 "播客中，@JohnPrideaux 解释了国家保守主义的力量🎧。
item.description: “Even when these parties fail, they seem to have disproportionate influence.” On our “Checks and Balance” podcast, @JohnPrideaux explains the power of national conservatism econ.st/3T0yZy2 🎧

item.title:
让客户、员工和投资者满意并非易事。
这就是好市多深受喜爱的原因： 👇
item.description:
Keeping customers, employees and investors happy is no mean feat.

This is why Costco is so loved: econ.st/3UHS6OU 👇
